SELECT order_id, order_date, state FROM morder WHERE member_id=#{value} ORDER BY order_date DESC

SELECT o.order_id, o.order_date, o.member_id, o.order_state, od.total_product, od.state1, od.state2, od.state3, od.state4, od.state5, od.state6, p.total_price, p.pay_type FROM order_view o, orderdetail_view od, payment_view p WHERE o.order_id = od.order_id AND p.order_id = od.order_id ORDER BY order_date DESC
